name: SHINING STREET 21
description:
Hello Guys!   

This is my thind game in the universe "Delivery for Dr. Shtraus".

This game is a kind of theatrical performance in the form of a short game. The story takes place around the hotel and takes place after the events of the second part "UNSOLVED CASE".  The project is a bit experimential.

I would be very glad to hear your opinion after passing the game.
